name: LedgerUp
long_description: LedgerUp is your AI RevOps teammate for B2B SaaS, transforming contract-based billing from a chore into a frictionless, revenue-accelerating process. We parse contracts, issue invoices, and collect payments in real-time, all while surfacing actionable analyticsâ€”allowing your finance team to escape spreadsheet chaos and focus on strategic growth. Just close deals and let us handle your RevOps for you.
one_liner: Your AI billing teammate that automates contracts to revenue
